statements: SELECT * FROM cross_docking_performance_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_shipments FROM cross_docking_performance_reports;
SELECT * FROM cross_docking_performance_reports WHERE avg_processing_time > 5;
SELECT report_date, total_shipments, avg_processing_time FROM cross_docking_performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(total_shipments), MIN(avg_processing_time) FROM cross_docking_performance_reports;
SELECT * FROM cross_docking_performance_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, total_shipments FROM cross_docking_performance_reports WHERE avg_processing_time > 5.0 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports, AVG(total_shipments) AS avg_shipments FROM cross_docking_performance_reports GROUP BY report_date HAVING total_shipments > 50;

SELECT report_id, DATE_FORMAT(report_date, '%M %d, %Y') AS formatted_date FROM cross_docking_performance_reports WHERE peak_hours_start BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY peak_hours_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM cross_docking_performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_shipments ASC, avg_processing_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, performance_score FROM performance_reports WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT area_name, issue_description FROM improvement_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, operation_id, performance_score FROM performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, suggested_action FROM improvement_areas ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT report_date, performance_score FROM performance_reports WHERE operation_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM improvement_areas WHERE LENGTH(issue_description) > 50 ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM performance_reports GROUP BY report_date ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT area_name, suggested_action FROM improvement_areas WHERE LENGTH(suggested_action) > 20 ORDER BY area_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM performance_reports WHERE performance_score > 90 ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT report_name, created_date FROM PerformanceReports WHERE report_id = 3;
SELECT operation_name, operation_type FROM CrossDockingOperations WHERE operation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT area_name, improvement_details FROM ImprovementAreas WHERE area_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM CrossDockingOperations WHERE operation_type = 'Inbound' ORDER BY operation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, created_date FROM PerformanceReports ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, improvement_details FROM ImprovementAreas WHERE area_id > 5 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT operation_name, operation_date FROM CrossDockingOperations WHERE operation_type = 'Inbound' AND operation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReports pr JOIN CrossDockingOperations cdo ON pr.report_id = cdo.operation_id WHERE pr.report_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports;
SELECT report_date, total_shipments FROM performance_reports WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT warehouse_id, MAX(total_delays) AS max_delays FROM performance_reports GROUP BY warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM shipment_details WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, total_shipments ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_delays FROM performance_reports WHERE total_delays > 10;
SELECT * FROM shipment_details WHERE shipment_type = 'Express' ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, description FROM improvement_areas WHERE urgency_level = 3;
SELECT report_date, total_shipments, total_delays FROM performance_reports WHERE report_id IN (SELECT report_id FROM performance_reports WHERE warehouse_id = 3);
SELECT * FROM performance_reports ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, operation_id, performance_score FROM performance_reports WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT area_name, location, capacity FROM cross_docking_areas WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT id, operation_name, start_time, end_time FROM operations WHERE start_time >= '08:00:00';
SELECT area_name, description FROM improvement_areas WHERE area_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM performance_reports WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT report_id, operation_id, log_time FROM performance_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT area_name, location, capacity FROM cross_docking_areas WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT operation_name, start_time, end_time FROM operations WHERE start_time < '10:00:00';
SELECT id, area_name, description FROM improvement_areas WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
